value.summary: All provided JSON outputs closely track the report without introducing fabricated quantitative results or overstating the evidence. The key quantitative findings (dayside brightness temperature, heat transport efficiency, Bond albedo upper bound, 15 µm feature depth, likelihood ratio, and plausible pressure range) are reproduced accurately with appropriate context and calibration (e.g., “tentative/moderate” strength, emphasis on degeneracies and systematics).
